snippet.title: EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds - VR Escape Room (Meta Quest & PCVR)
snippet.description:
EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds is a VR escape room game for the Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro, as well as all PCVR headsets like Vive, Rift, and WMR. ▼ More information below ▼

 —
You find yourself trapped in a penthouse - in a mile high building which reaches above the clouds but is still partly under construction. Not everything seems to be working as expected... you might just have to do some construction work yourself, or even nick some equipment from that canceled base jump event on the roof... 
—

EscapeVR: Trapped Above the Clouds is inspired by real-life escape games, makes full use of the room-scale virtual reality, and offers challenging puzzles you have to solve to escape the room. 
Can you escape? 

► Get it here:
Meta Quest Store: https://www.meta.com/de-de/experiences/6601569463276497/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/566970/EscapeVR_Above_the_Clouds/
Oculus Rift Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/859122784213043/
Viveport: https://www.viveport.com/apps/22f060f9-4bda-4084-868c-66ee72e4cda9

Thanks and have fun!
